mapper.select: SELECT req.lecture_id, lecture_title,academy_name FROM required_lecture req INNER JOIN lecture lec ON req.lecture_id=lec.lecture_id INNER JOIN academy acdm ON lec.academy_id=acdm.academy_id WHERE emp_position=#{empPosition} AND emp_years=#{empYears}
SELECT depth1_field FROM lecture_category GROUP BY depth1_field
SELECT depth2_skill FROM lecture_category WHERE depth1_field=#{0} GROUP BY depth2_skill
SELECT depth3_course FROM lecture_category WHERE depth1_field=#{depth1} AND depth2_skill=#{depth2} GROUP BY depth3_course
SELECT lecture_id ,lecture_title ,academy_name FROM lecture lec INNER JOIN academy acdm ON lec.academy_id=acdm.academy_id WHERE lecture_title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{0},'%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO required_lecture (lecture_id, emp_position, emp_years) VALUES (#{lectureId},#{empPosition},#{empYears})
